title: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Captain's Mode<:@><@_href>/dota2/Captain%27s_Mode<@_class>mw-redirect<@_title>Captain's Mode
  • second pick phase is changed from
  • Dire<:@><@_style>color:red
  • /
  • Radiant<:@><@_style>color:green
  • /
  • Dire<:@><@_style>color:red
  • /
  • Radiant<:@><@_style>color:green
  • to
  • Dire<:@><@_style>color:red
  • /
  • Radiant<:@><@_style>color:green
  • /
  • Radiant<:@><@_style>color:green
  • /
  • Dire<:@><@_style>color:red
  • (assuming Radiant is first pick)
  • Multiple
  • Critical Strike<:@><@_href>/dota2/Critical_Strike<@_title>Critical Strike
  • procs are now rolled from strongest to weakest and will stop rolling once a proc occurs (this results in the same DPS but is less lilkely to have multiple crits in a row or multiple attacks without a crit.)
  • Cooldown Percentage Reduction no longer stacks (Sources of flat cooldown reduction still stack)
  • Increased HP Regen of all heroes with 0 HP Regen to 0.25
  • Water Rune<:@><@_href>/dota2/index.php?title=Water_Rune&action=edit&redlink=1<@_class>new<@_title>Water Rune (page does not exist)
  • healing reduced from 80HP to 40HP
  • Second
  • Roshan<:@><@_href>/dota2/Roshan<@_title>Roshan
  • no longer drops cheese
  • Neutral Creeps<:@><@_href>/dota2/Neutral_Creeps<@_title>Neutral Creeps
  • now drop
  • 5
  • neutral items per tier

title: Aeon Disk
descriptionHtml:
• Bonus HP reduced from 300 to 250
  • Aeon Disk Cooldown increases by 20s every time it triggers up to 165s. Cooldown: 105/125/145/165s

title: Abyssal Blade
descriptionHtml: • Bash bonus damage increased from 100 to 120

title: Aether Lens
descriptionHtml: • Mana Regeneration bonus reduced from 3.0 to 2.5

title: Arcane Blink
descriptionHtml: • Ability Cooldown Reduction increased from 25% to 30%

title: Arcane Boots
descriptionHtml: • Replenish Mana mana restored increased from 160 to 175

title: Bottle
descriptionHtml:
• Health Restored reduced from 115 to 110
  • Mana Restored reduced from 65 to 60
  • Restore time increased from 2.5 to 2.7

title: Drum of Endurance
descriptionHtml: • Strength and Intelligence bonuses increased from 6 to 7

title: Enchanted Mango
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 70 to 65

title: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
descriptionHtml: • Mana Regen reduced from 3.5 to 2.5

title: Falcon Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Bonus Attack Damage increased from 10 to 12
  • Bonus Health increased from 175 to 200

title: Gleipnir
descriptionHtml:
• Bonus Intelligence increased from 20 to 24
  • Bonus Strength and Agility increased from 12 to 14
  • Projectile Speed increased from 1750 to 1900

title: Helm of the Overlord
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Recipe. Now requires Helm of the Dominator, Vladmir's Offering and a 1000 gold recipe (Total cost increased from 6000 to 6050)
  • Bonus Stats reduced from +20 to +8
  • Now can only dominate 1 creep
  • Creep Movement Speed increased from 380 to 400
  • Creep Bonus Attack Damage increased from 25 to 80
  • Creep Bonus Armor increased from 4 to 8
  • Now also grants Vladmir's Aura (+3 armor, +1.75 Mana Regen, +18% damage, +15% Lifesteal in 1200 radius)

title: Hurricane Pike
descriptionHtml:
• Hurricane Thrust duration increased from 5s to 6s
  • Hurricane Thrust max attacks increased from 4 to 5

title: Mage Slayer
descriptionHtml: • Recipe Reworked: Now requires Oblivion Staff + Cloak + 400g Recipe. (total gold cost reduced from 3250 to 2400).

title: Rod of Atos
descriptionHtml:
• Bonus Intelligence increased from 20 to 24
  • Bonus Strength and Agility increased from 10 to 12
  • Projectile Speed increased from 1750 to 1900

title: Sange
descriptionHtml: • Status Resistance reduced from 16 to 12

title: Sentry Ward
descriptionHtml:
• Replenish time decreased from 75 to 70
  • Duration reduced from 8 minutes to 7

title: Silver Edge
descriptionHtml:
• Recipe Reworked. Now requires Shadow Blade + Crystalys + 350g recipe. (Total cost decreased from 5650 to 5300)
  • Now Grants +60 damage, +40 Attack Speed, and a 30% chance of 160% critical damage.
  • Attacks breaking out of invisibility now deal a guaranteed 160% crit with 175 bonus damage

title: Smoke of Deceit
descriptionHtml: • Increased Max Stock from 2 to 3 (Starting stock is still 2)

title: Wind Waker
descriptionHtml: • Recipe reduced from 1600 to 1300 (Total cost reduced from 7125 to 6825)

title: Witch Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Damage per tick reduced from 1x int to 0.75x int
  • Duration increased from 3s to 4s
  • Fixed interaction that caused Witch Blade to give permanent True Strike against magic immune targets

title: Faded Broach
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

title: Ironwood Tree
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

title: Imp Claw
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

title: Illusionist's Cape
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

title: Minotaur Horn
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

title: Orb of Destruction
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

title: Ballista
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

title: Pig Pole
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 1 Item
  • Grants +6 to all stats
  • Active: Pig, Out! Turns the owner into a pig for 4 seconds and grants +10% movespeed. Cooldown: 25s. Mana Cost: 50

title: Tumbler's Toy
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 1 Item
  • Grants 200 Mana
  • Active: Vault. Propels your unit forward 300 units. CD: 30s
  • Goes on a 3s cooldown when receiving player based damage

title: Brigand's Blade
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 2 Item
  • Grants +10 Damage and +10 Attack Speed
  • Passive: Dark Mercy. When attacking an enemy, deals +7 damage for each 10% HP the enemy is missing

title: Fae Grenade
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 2 Item
  • Grants +20 Movement Speed
  • Active: Shadow Brand. Throws a Bomb to an enemy within 900 range dealing your attack damage and applying a debuff that provides vision of the unit and deals 20dps for 7 seconds. Cooldown: 20s Mana Cost: 25

title: Blast Rig
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 3 Item
  • Grants 8 armor
  • Passive: Hair Trigger. The next time you get attacked by a hero within 300 range, explode dealing 300 damage to all enemies within a 300 radius and applying a 100% blind for 2.5 seconds. Cooldown: 20s

title: Ascetic's Cap
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 4 Item
  • Grants 300 Health and 10 Health Regen
  • Passive: Endurance. Whenever a debuff from a player controlled source would be applied to the owner, grant 50% Status resistance for 3 seconds. CD 30s

title: Witchbane
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 4 Item
  • Passively causes your hero to deal extra magic damage to its target equal to 4% of its max mana on attack
  • Active: Dispel. Dispels all enemies and allies within 300 radius. Cast Range: 500. Mana Cost: 75. Cooldown: 20s

title: Arcanist's Armor
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 5 Item
  • +5 Armor, +20% Magic Resistance
  • Passively grants +5 armor and +20% Magic Resistance to all allies in a 900 radius
  • Active: Mega Shield. Gains a 35% damage reflection aura in a 900 radius affecting allied units for the next 5 seconds. Cooldown:20s (Does not affect illusions)

title: Chipped Vest
descriptionHtml: • HP Regen reduced from 5 to 4

title: Fairy's Trinket
descriptionHtml: • Bonus Health reduced from 100 to 75

title: Possessed Mask
descriptionHtml: • Lifesteal rescaled from 7% to a flat 7HP per attack

title: Trusty Shovel
descriptionHtml: • Dig Cooldown reduced from 55 to 50

title: Enchanted Quiver
descriptionHtml:
• Bonus Damage decreased from 300 to 200
  • Cooldown decreased from 5s to 4

title: Ceremonial Robe
descriptionHtml: • Debuff is no longer visible if enemies don't have vision of its holder

title: Flicker
descriptionHtml:
• Cooldown increased from 4 to 5s
  • Now blinks in place if the owner received damage in the last 3 seconds

title: Spider Legs
descriptionHtml:
• No longer considered a boot
  • Movement Speed Bonus reduced from 65 to 25

title: Stormcrafter
descriptionHtml: • Stormcrafter no longer triggers if the holder is invisible to the target

title: Fallen Sky
descriptionHtml: • Cast Range reduced from 1600 to 1200

  • <:@><@_alt>Nerf<@_src>/commons/images/thumb/1/17/Nuker.png/25px-Nuker.png<@_decoding>async<@_title>Nerf<@_width>25<@_height>25<@_srcset>/commons/images/thumb/1/17/Nuker.png/38px-Nuker.png 1.5x, /commons/images/thumb/1/17/Nuker.png/50px-Nuker.png 2x<@_loading>lazy

  • <:@><@_alt>Nerf<@_src>/commons/images/thumb/1/17/Nuker.png/25px-Nuker.png<@_decoding>async<@_title>Nerf<@_width>25<@_height>25<@_srcset>/commons/images/thumb/1/17/Nuker.png/38px-Nuker.png 1.5x, /commons/images/thumb/1/17/Nuker.png/50px-Nuker.png 2x<@_loading>lazy

  • <:@><@_alt>Rework<@_src>/commons/images/thumb/7/76/Carry.png/25px-Carry.png<@_decoding>async<@_title>Rework<@_width>25<@_height>25<@_srcset>/commons/images/thumb/7/76/Carry.png/38px-Carry.png 1.5x, /commons/images/thumb/7/76/Carry.png/50px-Carry.png 2x<@_loading>lazy
  • Reworked Scepter. Vector Targeted. Broodmother creates a 900 width invisible web line that takes 2 seconds to form. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will make it visible and become rooted after 0.25s of 100% slow. They will also be visible in fog and receive 100dps for 4 seconds. Broodmother's team is notified in the Minimap whenever someone trips in a Web line. Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until the duration expires, but illusions don't trigger it. Maximum of 5 Snares can be active and Snares can't be cast overlapping another. 2 Charges: Mana Cost: 100. Cooldown: 20s. Cast Range: 600
  • <:@><@_alt>Rework<@_src>/commons/images/thumb/7/76/Carry.png/25px-Carry.png<@_decoding>async<@_title>Rework<@_width>25<@_height>25<@_srcset>/commons/images/thumb/7/76/Carry.png/38px-Carry.png 1.5x, /commons/images/thumb/7/76/Carry.png/50px-Carry.png 2x<@_loading>lazy
